alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 2:47PM CDT until March 25 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...ACCUMULATING SNOW AND GUSTY WINDS EXPECTED LATE TONIGHT THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... .Periods of light to moderate snow and gusty north winds are expected in Calumet and Manitowoc counties late tonight through early Saturday afternoon. Snowfall accumulations of 2 to 5 inches are expected with north winds gusting to 35 mph at times. Hazardous travel conditions are anticipated, especially late tonight into Saturday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. North winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Calumet and Manitowoc Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 1 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially late tonight into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
